text:
hello <@U07A9F6C0SX>
if possible can you share the page link so that I can check what's the exact issue ?
you can try this CSS "overflow-wrap: normal;"
`word-break: normal` might do the trick? Hard to diagnose without seeing a link as Rishav mentioned.

i think i figured it out! unknown to me the client _did_ add code to the OG template i cloned for work break, specific in languages Chinese standard, Korean, and Japanese. This was causing it to break per character on English words
